content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Generation System
Located around position (-4.5, 12.5), consists of:
- Steam engine at (-4.5, 12.5)
- Boiler with coal fuel at (-4.5, 16.0)
- Offshore pump at (-3.5, 27.5)
- Connected by pipe groups carrying water and steam
- Multiple electric poles forming electricity group (id=12695)
Status: Working and generating power

### Iron Production Line
Located around (-28.0, -61.0), consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0, -61.0)
- Wooden chest at (-27.5, -59.5)
- Burner inserter at (-26.5, -59.5)
- Stone furnace at (-25.0, -59.0)
- Output chest at (-22.5, -58.5) containing iron and copper plates
Status: Working

### Secondary Mining/Smelting Setup
Located around (-18.0, -53.0), consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-18.0, -53.0)
- Input chest at (-17.5, -51.5)
- Burner inserter at (-16.5, -51.5)
- Stone furnace at (-15.0, -51.0)
- Output chest at (-12.5, -50.5) containing iron plates
Status: Partially working (mining drill needs fuel)

### Coal Mining Setup
Located around (41.0, -82.0), consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (41.0, -82.0)
- Output chest at (41.5, -80.5) containing coal
- Burner inserter at (41.5, -79.5)
Status: Mining drill needs fuel

### Automation Science Pack Production
Located around (8.5, 13.5), consists of:
- Input chest at (5.5, 13.5)
- Burner inserter at (6.5, 13.5)
- Assembling machine at (8.5, 13.5)
- Output chest at (11.5, 13.5) containing automation science packs
- Connected belt groups for material transport
Status: Working but missing copper plate ingredients

ERROR TIPS

### Resource Extraction Errors
- Verify the target chest actually contains the required items before attempting extraction
- Check the exact coordinates when trying to extract items

### Entity Placement Errors
- Check if the target location is clear of other entities before placing new ones
- Ensure you have the required items in inventory before attempting to place them
- When placing electric poles, ensure there is enough space around the target location

### Power Connection Issues
- Make sure to have all required items in inventory before attempting to connect power poles
- Verify power poles are within connection range of each other

### Production Issues
- Ensure all required ingredients are available before starting production
- Keep mining drills fueled to maintain resource production
- Make sure assembling machines have power and all required ingredients

### Crafting Errors
- For items requiring furnaces or assembling machines, use the appropriate production facility instead of trying to hand craft
- Ensure you have all required ingredients before attempting to craft items
